item.g:title: Black Faux Georgette Party and Festival Printed Saree
item.g:description: Black printed saree with circular print, butta print, swarowski work and patti border.This saree is coupled with match blouse.There might be some color variation.

item.g:title: Fuchsia Pink Faux Chiffon Embroidered Casual Saree
item.g:description: Fuchsia Pink embroidered casual saree intricate with zari thread, resham thread, floral work, keri work, leaf work and patch patti border work.Saree comes with a Peach Yellow an unstitch blouse piece of Cotton fabric which can be customised as per your requirement. Customisation includes changing front neck style, back neck style, increasing/reducing the length of sleeves.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.
item.g:color: Deep Cerise Pink and Jungle Green

item.g:title: Midnight Blue and Peach Yellow Silk and Faux Georgette Party Saree
item.g:description: Midnight Blue and Peach Yellow embroidered party saree intricate with zari thread, sequins, floral work, leaf work and patch patti border work.Saree comes with a Navy Blue unstitch blouse piece of Art Silk fabric which can be customised as per your requirement. Customisation includes changing front neck style, back neck style, increasing/reducing the length of sleeves.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.Fall and edging is done to all sarees and it's free of cost.

item.g:title: Cream Yellow and Black Chiffon Embroidered Party Saree
item.g:description: Cream Yellow and Black embroidered party saree intricate with zari thread, resham thread, sequins, floral work, leaf work, stripes work, circular print and patch patti border work.Saree comes with an unstitch blouse piece which can be customised as per your requirement. Customisation includes changing front neck style, back neck style, increasing/reducing the length of sleeves.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.Fall and edging is done to all sarees and it's free of cost.

item.g:title: Light Coral Pink and Persian Blue Chiffon Georgette and Net Saree
item.g:description: Light Coral Pink and Persian Blue embroidered festival saree intricate with zari thread, sequins, floral work, leaf work, keri print and patch patti border work.Saree comes with an unstitch blouse piece which can be customised as per your requirement. Customisation includes changing front neck style, back neck style, increasing/reducing the length of sleeves.Accessories which is shown in the image is only for shooting purpose.There might be some color variation.Fall and edging is done to all sarees and it's free of cost.
